meanings.definition: A parallelogram with opposite equal acute angles, opposite equal obtuse angles, and four equal sides.
meanings.sent1: I drew a rhombus on my paper with four equal sides.
meanings.sent2: The diamond-shaped sign was actually a rhombus.
meanings.sent3: The rhombus-shaped cake was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile formed a rhombus of happiness on her face.
meanings.sent5: The kite soared high in the sky, resembling a rhombus in flight.

meanings.definition: A quadrilateral with all sides of equal length.
meanings.sent1: The playground had a colorful rhombus painted on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The field was divided into sections, one of which was a rhombus.
meanings.sent3: The rhombus-shaped pool was perfect for swimming laps.
meanings.sent4: His phone screen cracked into a rhombus shape after the fall.
meanings.sent5: The garden was designed with a rhombus pattern, creating a unique look.
